node.detail_zh: 患者為印尼籍外傭，於 7 月 25 日前與第 #3909、#4116、#4118 及 #4128 宗個案患者暫住於安盛僱傭公司於上環建安商業大廈的宿舍，7 月 29 日至 31 日曾於朋友僱主於坑口的家中暫住，8 月 6 日再回到安盛僱傭公司宿舍，沒有病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient is an Indonesian domestic helper, having stayed at the boarding house of Apik Empolyment Agency at Kin On Commercial Building with patients #3909, #4116, #4118, and #4128 until July 25. She temporarily stayed at the home of her friend's employer between July 29 and 31, and returned to the boarding house on August 6. She exhibited no symptoms.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 上環建安商業大廈外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Kin On Commercial Building (Sheung Wan) Boarding House for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 同住在上環建安商業大廈宿舍的 5 名印尼外傭確診。
groups.description_en: Five Indonesian domestic helpers residing at the boarding house of Kin On Commercial Building, Sheung Wan were diagnosed positive for the virus.
